languages.text: "Я все не могу перестать думать о губернаторе Даргонуса. Почему его не было при штурме дворца Вольного Торговца?"
"I can't stop thinking about the governor of Dargonus. Why wasn't he there when they stormed the Rogue Trader's palace?"
languages.original_text: "Я все не могу перестать думать о губернаторе Даргонуса. Почему его не было при штурме дворца Вольного Торговца?"

traits.locale_text: "I can't stop thinking about the governor of Dargonus. Why wasn't he there when they stormed the Rogue Trader's palace?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I can't stop thinking about the governor of Dargonus. Why wasn't he there when they stormed the Rogue Trader's palace?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I can't stop thinking about the governor of Dargonus. Why wasn't he there when they stormed the Rogue Trader's palace?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I can't stop thinking about the governor of Dargonus. Why wasn't he there when they stormed the Rogue Trader's palace?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “我不禁在想达戈努斯的总督。当那群敌人冲进行商浪人的宫殿里时，他为什么不在那里？”
languages.original_text: "I can't stop thinking about the governor of Dargonus. Why wasn't he there when they stormed the Rogue Trader's palace?"

traits.locale_text: “我不禁在想达戈努斯的总督。当那群敌人冲进行商浪人的宫殿里时，他为什么不在那里？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Je me demande pourquoi le gouverneur de Dargonus n'était pas là quand ils ont pris d'assaut le palais {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}... Ça me trotte dans la tête cette histoire. »
languages.original_text: "I can't stop thinking about the governor of Dargonus. Why wasn't he there when they stormed the Rogue Trader's palace?"

traits.locale_text: « Je me demande pourquoi le gouverneur de Dargonus n'était pas là quand ils ont pris d'assaut le palais {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}... Ça me trotte dans la tête cette histoire. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «No puedo dejar de pensar en el gobernador de Dargonus. ¿Por qué no estaba presente cuando asaltaron el palacio de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente?».
languages.original_text: "I can't stop thinking about the governor of Dargonus. Why wasn't he there when they stormed the Rogue Trader's palace?"

traits.locale_text: «No puedo dejar de pensar en el gobernador de Dargonus. ¿Por qué no estaba presente cuando asaltaron el palacio de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ダルゴナスの総督のことばかり考えてるの。自由開拓者の宮殿が襲われたとき、どうしてあの場にいなかったのかしら？」
languages.original_text: "I can't stop thinking about the governor of Dargonus. Why wasn't he there when they stormed the Rogue Trader's palace?"

traits.locale_text: 「ダルゴナスの総督のことばかり考えてるの。自由開拓者の宮殿が襲われたとき、どうしてあの場にいなかったのかしら？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ich muss ständig an den Gouverneur von Dargonus denken. Warum war er nicht dort, als der Palast {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} gestürmt wurde?"
languages.original_text: "I can't stop thinking about the governor of Dargonus. Why wasn't he there when they stormed the Rogue Trader's palace?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss ständig an den Gouverneur von Dargonus denken. Warum war er nicht dort, als der Palast {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} gestürmt wurde?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "I can't stop thinking about the governor of Dargonus. Why wasn't he there when they stormed the Rogue Trader's palace?"

languages.text: "Dargonus valisini düşünmeden edemiyorum. Saldırı sırasında neden Hür Tacir'in sarayında değildi?"
languages.original_text: "I can't stop thinking about the governor of Dargonus. Why wasn't he there when they stormed the Rogue Trader's palace?"

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus valisini düşünmeden edemiyorum. Saldırı sırasında neden Hür Tüccar'ın sarayında değildi?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
